outro.text: It was nice talking to you. See you later!

actions.text: I've got many stories to tell. Can i tell you a story?
In nowhereland, there was a very rich king named Peter. He was tall and strong! Everyday before his morning walks, he would put on a crown on his...
Sorry. I'm so forgetful. Where do kings wear their crowns?
As i was saying, king Peter [...]
